thread.title: Rob Kardashian Sends Prayers to 'Brother' Lamar Odom, Kendall Jenner Reportedly Heads to Vegas
thread.title_full: Rob Kardashian Sends Prayers to 'Brother' Lamar Odom, Kendall Jenner Reportedly Heads to Vegas - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Rob Kardashian Sends Prayers to 'Brother' Lamar Odom, Kendall Jenner Reportedly Heads to Vegas
text: Rob Kardashian has broken his silence regarding brother-in-law Lamar Odom ‘s hospitalization. The 28-year-old reality star, who typically keeps relatively quiet on social media, took to Instagram to post a heartfelt message to Lamar, which you can see below. “Praying nonstop for my Brother!!” Rob captioned a throwback photo of them. Khloe Kardashian is currently with [...] »
